content.raw:
I will take care of that. One more thing:

```
atlas_bringup.launch:  <include file="$(find pr2_controller_manager)/controller_manager.launch" />
atlas_bringup.launch:        pkg="pr2_controller_manager" type="spawner" output="log"
atlas_v3_bringup.launch:  <include file="$(find pr2_controller_manager)/controller_manager.launch" />
atlas_v3_bringup.launch:        pkg="pr2_controller_manager" type="spawner" output="log"
```

pr2_controller_manager is being us by our bringup launch files.

pullrequest.title: pr2_mechanism is not a package, this breaks [tutorial](http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=drcsim_control_sync&cat=drcsim)

content.raw:
as far as I know, none of our tutorials still exercise `pr2_controller_manager`.  The PID control in the AtlasPlugin and the behavior control in libAtlasSimInterface are what the teams rely on. So it's probably safe to remove pr2 package dependencies.

We could also remove following launch files that depend on `pr2_controller_manager`:

~~~
./drcsim_gazebo/launch/atlas_arm_controllers.launch:  <include file="$(find pr2_controller_manager)/controller_manager.launch" />
./drcsim_gazebo/launch/atlas_arm_controllers.launch:        pkg="pr2_controller_manager" type="spawner" output="log"
./drcsim_gazebo/launch/atlas_arm_controllers.launch:        pkg="pr2_controller_manager" type="spawner" output="log"
./drcsim_gazebo/launch/atlas_position_controllers.launch:  <include file="$(find pr2_controller_manager)/controller_manager.launch" />
./drcsim_gazebo/launch/atlas_position_controllers.launch:        pkg="pr2_controller_manager" type="spawner" output="log"
./drcsim_gazebo/launch/atlas_position_controllers.launch:        pkg="pr2_controller_manager" type="spawner" output="log"
./drcsim_gazebo/launch/drc_trajectory_controllers.launch:  <include file="$(find pr2_controller_manager)/controller_manager.launch" />
./drcsim_gazebo/launch/drc_trajectory_controllers.launch:        pkg="pr2_controller_manager" type="spawner" output="log"
./drcsim_gazebo/launch/drc_trajectory_controllers.launch:        pkg="pr2_controller_manager" type="spawner" output="log"
./drcsim_gazebo/launch/drc_trajectory_controllers.launch:        pkg="pr2_controller_manager" type="spawner" output="log"
~~~
content.html:
as far as I know, none of our tutorials still exercise pr2_controller_manager. The PID control in the AtlasPlugin and the behavior control in libAtlasSimInterface are what the teams rely on. So it's probably safe to remove pr2 package dependencies.

We could also remove following launch files that depend on pr2_controller_manager:

./drcsim_gazebo/launch/atlas_arm_controllers.launch:  <include file="$(find pr2_controller_manager)/controller_manager.launch" />
./drcsim_gazebo/launch/atlas_arm_controllers.launch:        pkg="pr2_controller_manager" type="spawner" output="log"
./drcsim_gazebo/launch/atlas_arm_controllers.launch:        pkg="pr2_controller_manager" type="spawner" output="log"
./drcsim_gazebo/launch/atlas_position_controllers.launch:  <include file="$(find pr2_controller_manager)/controller_manager.launch" />
./drcsim_gazebo/launch/atlas_position_controllers.launch:        pkg="pr2_controller_manager" type="spawner" output="log"
./drcsim_gazebo/launch/atlas_position_controllers.launch:        pkg="pr2_controller_manager" type="spawner" output="log"
./drcsim_gazebo/launch/drc_trajectory_controllers.launch:  <include file="$(find pr2_controller_manager)/controller_manager.launch" />
./drcsim_gazebo/launch/drc_trajectory_controllers.launch:        pkg="pr2_controller_manager" type="spawner" output="log"
./drcsim_gazebo/launch/drc_trajectory_controllers.launch:        pkg="pr2_controller_manager" type="spawner" output="log"
./drcsim_gazebo/launch/drc_trajectory_controllers.launch:        pkg="pr2_controller_manager" type="spawner" output="log"

see 6ecdabf

content.raw:
I believe `pr2_mechanism` is a "stack", which errors in hydro if one queries:

~~~
$ rospack find pr2_mechanism
[rospack] Error: stack/package pr2_mechanism not found
~~~

even with `ros-hydro-pr2-mechanism` debian package installed:

~~~
$ dpkg -l | grep 'pr2-mechanism'
ii  ros-fuerte-pr2-mechanism                    1.6.4-s1367574271~precise                           PR2 mechanism
~~~
content.html:
I believe pr2_mechanism is a "stack", which errors in hydro if one queries:

$ rospack find pr2_mechanism
[rospack] Error: stack/package pr2_mechanism not found

even with ros-hydro-pr2-mechanism debian package installed:

$ dpkg -l | grep 'pr2-mechanism'
ii  ros-fuerte-pr2-mechanism                    1.6.4-s1367574271~precise                           PR2 mechanism

pullrequest.title: pr2_mechanism is not a package, this breaks [tutorial](http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=drcsim_control_sync&cat=drcsim)

content.raw:
The current pr2 dependencies in -release repository are:

```
jrivero@nium drcsim-release $ (prerelease *) grep -R pr2 * | uniq
precise/debian/control: ros-hydro-pr2-mechanism,
precise/debian/control: ros-hydro-pr2-controllers,
precise/debian/control: ros-hydro-pr2-controller-manager,
precise/debian/control: ros-hydro-pr2-controllers,
trusty/debian/control: ros-indigo-pr2-mechanism-msgs,
```

We are using pr2 mechanism msgs in `atlas_description/urdf/atlas.transmission` and pr2 controller manager in several files under `drcsim_gazebo/launch`
content.html:
The current pr2 dependencies in -release repository are:

jrivero@nium drcsim-release $ (prerelease *) grep -R pr2 * | uniq
precise/debian/control: ros-hydro-pr2-mechanism,
precise/debian/control: ros-hydro-pr2-controllers,
precise/debian/control: ros-hydro-pr2-controller-manager,
precise/debian/control: ros-hydro-pr2-controllers,
trusty/debian/control: ros-indigo-pr2-mechanism-msgs,

We are using pr2 mechanism msgs in atlas_description/urdf/atlas.transmission and pr2 controller manager in several files under drcsim_gazebo/launch

content.raw:
~~~
$ make
mkdir -p bin
cd build && cmake -Wdev -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=/opt/ros/hydro/share/ros/core/rosbuild/rostoolchain.cmake  ..
Re-run cmake no build system arguments
[rosbuild] Building package control_synchronization_tutorial
Failed to invoke /opt/ros/hydro/bin/rospack deps-manifests control_synchronization_tutorial
[rospack] Error: package/stack 'drcsim_gazebo_ros_plugins' depends on non-existent package 'pr2_mechanism' and rosdep claims that it is not a system dependency. Check the ROS_PACKAGE_PATH or try calling 'rosdep update'


CMake Error at /opt/ros/hydro/share/ros/core/rosbuild/public.cmake:129 (message):
  

  Failed to invoke rospack to get compile flags for package
  'control_synchronization_tutorial'.  Look above for errors from rospack
  itself.  Aborting.  Please fix the broken dependency!

Call Stack (most recent call first):
  /opt/ros/hydro/share/ros/core/rosbuild/public.cmake:207 (rosbuild_invoke_rospack)
  CMakeLists.txt:12 (rosbuild_init)


-- Configuring incomplete, errors occurred!
make: *** [all] Error 1
~~~

CMake Error at /opt/ros/hydro/share/ros/core/rosbuild/public.cmake:129 (message):
